title: My Gmail and outlook accounts will not delete any emails and they reappear after syncing?
content:
I have a Gmail and 2 outlook email accounts set up on my pixel 3a. Since getting the phone over a week ago nine of my emails from either accounts will deleted. Once the phone syncs they reappear and it is driving me mad! I have cleared the cache and cleared the storage and also deleted and reinstalled the email accounts. I have also completed a factory reset. 

Are there any other suggestions please?
